ERODE

Bannari Amman Institute of Technology: Inauguration of BIT Trophy 2016 - Inter-Collegiate Staff Cricket Tournament, 8 a.m.; NSS Special Medical Camp by PSG Hospital team, 10 a.m.; Awareness programme on Organic Farming and Skill Training, Panchayat Union Elementary Schools, Kaliyappagoundanpudur and Vettuvanpudur, 6 p.m.

Union Bank of India Officers’ Association - Tamil Nadu: 23rd General Body Meeting, inaugural address by Sanjay Sharma, General Manager, FGMO, Chennai, Hotel Club Melaange, 10 a.m.

SALEM

Ramakrishna Mission Ashrama: Uma Maheswari speaks on ‘Bhagavad Gita’, 5.30 p.m.

Mecheri Arulmigu Badrakaliamman Temple: Maha kumbabishekam festival, Maha Ganapathi homam, Lalitha Sahasranamam, abishekam, alankaram, deeparadanai, 8 a.m..; music concert by Sirkazhi Siva Chidambaram, Sankar Ganesh and Malathi Lakshman, 7 p.m.

Sri Skandashramam Trust, Udaiyapatti: Thaipoosam festival, Ganapathi homam, 5.30 a.m.; mahanyasajabam, 6.30 a.m.; ko pooja, 7 a.m.; Sai bhajan by Salem Sai Sath Sangam troupe, 6.30 a.m.; abishekam and deeparadanai, 9.30 a.m.; maha deeparadanai, 12.30 p.m. and 6.30 p.m.; Veena concert by S. Sivakami Karunakaran, 4 p.m.

Shree Parshwanath Jain Trust: Sri Kesariya Swetambar Jain Temple Maha Kumbabishekam, poojas, 9 a.m.; devotional songs concert, temple premises, Sankarnagar,

6 p.m.

Salem Sangeetha Vidwath Sabha: Carnatic music concert by Lalitha Rukmani of Kalakshetra, Chennai, Dr. Vijayaragavachariar manram, Cherry Road, 6.15 p.m.

Indian Medical Association: College of General Practitioners –Salem sub-faculty, continuing medical education programme, A.K. Kannan, consultant physician, speaks on ‘stress busters for doctors’, M. Muthukumaran, presides, Dr. Sundaravaradachariar memorial hall, IMA premises, 6 p.m.

Paalam book stall: Readers Forum, T. Senthilkumar reviews the book ‘War and Peace’ authored by Leo Tolstoy, Advaitha Asrama road, 11 a.m.

Neuro Foundation and Rotary Club of Omalur: Free medical counselling camp by R. Natarajan and team, South Indian Matriculation Higher Secondary School, Panjukalipatti, 9 a.m. to 2 p.m.

12 Tamil Nadu Battalion NCC: Mini marathon for NCC cadets, CSI Polytechnic College, 6 a.m.

Knowledge Institute of Technology and Confederation of Indian Industry Salem: Faculty Development programme on ‘personal effectiveness to organisational excellence’, P. Suresh Kumar, Director, Research and Industrial Consultancy, resource person, 10 a.m.

Indian Medical Association – Salem branch: Installation of M. Muthukumaran as president and his team of office-bearers, N. Muthurajan, State secretary, IMA-Tamil Nadu branch, chief guest, J.A. Jayalal, president-elect, IMA Tamil Nadu branch, R.M. Krishnan, former State president, IMA Tamil Nadu branch and others speak, P. Manivannan presides, IMA premises, 6.30 p.m.

Bharathi Vidyalaya Higher Secondary School Old Boys Association: Anniversary, free heart and diabetes screening camp in association with Bengaluru Narayana Health City, Yuvabaharathi Matriculation School, 10 a.m.

National Book Trust and New Century Book House: National Book Festival book exhibition, Bose Maidan, 9.30 a.m. and 9.30 p.m.

Cooptex: New Year and Pongal handloom textiles exhibition, Bose Maidan, 10 a.m. to 8 p.m.

NAMAKKAL

Department of Handlooms and Textiles: Pongal Festival handloom exhibition, Sri Namagiriamman Thirumana Mandapam, Kulakarai, 9.30 a.m.
